err.builders_inventory.minimessage.misma:
Mismatch between input and output at index %s
Report this and include the log!
container.builders_inventory.extended_in: The extended inventory was unable to load!
Report this to the mod developer!
Make sure the file exists in config/builders_inventory/inventory-#-page.nbt
If the file exists, report this to the mod developer!
If not, click the repair button in the top right!
You'll get a chance to confirm your choice
Use an item as the page's icon in the organize screen
This will lock all items in place
While locked, the page will function like a creative item tab
This will return the page to normal
Change the amount of the item
Click this button to show the slider
Click this button to hide the slider
Toggle on or off item NBT data
Adjust the size of the icon to make it fit better
Click this button to show the slider
Click this button to hide the slider
Clear item icon and return to a number icon
Discard icon changes and reset it back
Discard the changes to the icon and exit
Save the changes to the icon and exit
container.builders_inventory.minimessage: Forces MiniMessage formatting on all chat input
Returns MiniMessage formatting to only specific inputs
error.builders_inventory.extended_invent: Failed to load extended inventory! Report this issue to the builder's inventory developer!
Failed to save extended inventory! Report this issue to the builder's inventory developer!
Failed to save extended inventory page %s! Report this issue to the builder's inventory developer!
Failed to delete extended inventory file %s! Report this issue to the builder's inventory developer!
yacl3.config.builders_inventory:config.h:
Whether the hotbar swapper should only accept one button or both
Values:
- PREFER_FULL - Requires full key to swap at all, column is modifier
- PREFER_COLUMN - Requires column key to swap at all, full is modifier
- SEPERATE - Full and column keys function independently
Whether to allow pressing hotbar slot keys to quickly pick a hotbar row

Delay (in client ticks) between pressing a number key and swapping that row
Provides visual feedback for hitting the hotkeys

Whether the modifiers for Prefer Full or Column will stick
- Off/False - Default behavior, modifiers constantly update
- On/True - Modifiers are only determined when the main key is pressed
Whether the hotbar swapper should allow swapping with the extended inventory (if enabled)
How much to shift up hotbar rows belonging to the extended inventory
yacl3.config.builders_inventory:config.e: Whether to enable the extended inventory menu at all
Whether the creative inventory has a button to open the extended inventory

How the clear items button should behave in the extended inventory when shift clicked.
(Note: Only applies to clear button in extended inventory, creative inventory is unchanged)Values:
- NONE - Does absolutely nothing
- CLEAR_PLAYER - Clears just the player inventory, like vanilla minecraft (DEFAULT)
- CLEAR_EXTENDED - Clears just the current extended inventory tab
- CLEAR_ALL - Clears both the player inventory and current extended inventory tab

Delay in seconds between modifying extended inventory and saving
Lower delays are safer against crashes but write files more often
yacl3.config.builders_inventory:config.m: Syntax Highlighting

Whether minimessage inputs will be formatted to resemble the output
Does not copy style or font changes to maintain clarity
Preview

Whether the formatted minimessage preview displays
This only affects valid previews, errors will always display
Suggestions
Whether suggestions for tags will be shown when typing in a minimessage input
Update Delay

Number of ticks you must go without typing to update the minimessage formatter
Not recommended unless typing in a minimessage input slows your game
Enabled in Chat
Whether minimessage features are enabled for chat
Chat Preview Height
How high above the chat input the message preview is
Preview Offsets Chat
Whether the chat minimessage preview will shift the chat itself away from itself
Preview Offset Ignored
How many messages to ignore before shifting the chat UI if previewOffsetsChat is enabled
Force MiniMessage Button

Where on the chat bar to show the force minimessage formatting button
Values:
- NONE - Button hidden, normal chat
- LEFT - Button on left edge of chat
- RIGHT - Button on right edge of chat
Force MiniMessage Default

Whether the force minimessage formatting toggle is always on by default in chat
This is the value that the toggle will be set to when joining any world or server
Per-Server MiniMessage Commands

Map of server ips to regular expressions (regexes) that match commands to auto format minimessage on
USAGE: <server ip>=<command pattern>
server ip - The end of the server's address to match
command pattern - A regex that matches the commands for that server
The final regex will actually be ^/(?:<YOUR REGEX>)\\s+
To apply changes, restart the game or Ctrl+Shift+Click the force minimessage toggle button
yacl3.config.builders_inventory:config.o:
Force the creative mode operator items tab to appear, even if you don't have OP
(Useful for most players on creative servers who lack operator permissions)
_builders_inventory.comment.endkey: End key to avoid having to scroll to add commas all the time
